©2015 katrinschubert knitting directions the hat is worked in the round from the bottom up brim to crown beginning with a plain brioche ribbing in the round work two color brioche pattern rounds in color indicated mc or cc do not break yarn between rounds simply drop the previous color leaving it in front and pick up the new one without crossing yarns if you are counting rounds count only the stitches going up on the knit column you have to work 4 rounds 2 with each color to count 2 rounds i recommend nancy marchant´s classes and wonderful books on brioche knitting her online class offers more information on the intriguing brioche technique using mc and 16 circular needle cast on 60 sts 72 84 sts using the twisted german co method turn work continue working on this side for the set up row set up row using mc yarn wyif *sl1yo p1* repeat to end of row pm and join in round being careful not to twist stitches and to keep the yarn over the first slipped stitch brim now you are ready to start knitting the unicolored brim in the round round 1 *brk1 sl1yo* repeat to end of round round 2 *sl1yo brp1 * repeat to end of round next repeat rnd1 and rnd2 11 13 14 more times ending with rnd1 begin two color brioche pattern join cc yarn for the set up round part 1 set up round cc wyib * sl1yo brp1*
